description: Plugin Dev toolkit hooks for plugin validation

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
if [ -f '.claude-plugin/plugin.json' ]; then
  echo 'Plugin context detected'
  echo 'Available commands: /plugin-dev:scaffold, /plugin-dev:validate, /plugin-dev:test'
fi
exit 0

#!/bin/bash
FILE="$CLAUDE_TOOL_ARG_FILE_PATH"
if [[ "$FILE" == *'plugin.json' ]] && [ -f "$FILE" ]; then
  if ! python3 -c "import json; json.load(open('$FILE'))" 2>/dev/null; then
    echo 'Warning: plugin.json may have invalid JSON syntax'
  fi
fi
exit 0
